ca.corefacility.gview.map
Interface GViewMap

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject
All Known Implementing Classes:
GViewMapImp
public interface GViewMap
extends GViewEventSubject, GViewEventListener

gview.main viewing area, handles display of items
